profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-07 06:41:43 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.abstract: The Office of Public Relations Records include scrapbooks, clippings, audiovisual materials, press releases, and subject files pertaining to Tufts, its students, alumni, and faculty.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into five series: Public Relations scrapbooks; Subject files; News releases and press kits; Audiovisual materials; and Unprocessed accessions.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Clippings were collected by the Office of Public Relations between 1941 and 1973.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains scrapbooks created by the Office of Public Relations containing clippings from local and national newspapers about Tufts, its students, alumni, and faculty. The collection also includes audiovisual materials, press releases, and subject files. Tufts University's alumni, commencement, and the Lincoln Filene Center are three significant topics in this collection.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: University records are closed for 20 years from the date of their creation. Records older than 20 years that do not pertain to student education, staff and faculty employment and Board of Trustees records are open for research. This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains scrapbooks maintained by the Office of Public Relations of clippings from non-Tufts publications pertaining to the faculty, staff, students, and alumni of Tufts.

did.unittitle: Public Relations Scrapbook, Dental School Clippings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains subject files collected and maintained by the Office of Communications. Topics include Tufts University programs, buildings, and departments, student activities, events, and organizations. Files contain newspaper clippings, public press releases or announcements, internal publications and documentation, and photographs. These materials were received in a group with no clear indication of the original order; folders have been rearranged according to an alphabetical structure based on original folder titles, which appear subject based. Users should think broadly about departments and programs when searching for specific information as some folders may seem out of order, e.g. "Civil Engineering" not "Engineering, Civil."

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: 20 years from date of creation. Open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Press releases, media advisories, programs, and articles related to Commencement and White Coat ceremonies, 2009-2014; subject files on various topics from antibiotic resistance to vitamin E, 1999-2001.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged as received from the Office of Public Relations.

scopecontent.p: Press releases; PR strategies; materials related to the 2007 School of Dental Medicine expansion; and brochures related to Health Sciences degrees, programs, and facilities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Press releases; press kits; PR materials related to President Bacow and the Beyond Boundaries capital campaign; Step UP program annual reports, 2007-2011; and "Primer to the Boston Health Sciences Campus," 2005.
